QuestData.Title: Lifespring Cavern
QuestData.Description:
The drogbar have taken over my cavern. It is where we Rivermane practice our water magic and get much of the purest healing water in Highmountain.
Meet me there and we will cleanse that sacred place of these dark-dwellers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Jale Rivermane at Lifespring Cavern.
QuestData.RewardText: Are you ready? We are about to enter a cave... and the drogbar are at home in such dark places.
